description: Designed in a new Silent White colour to reflect the concept of silence and serenity of the noise cancelling headphones.

specification.SENSITIVITIES (DB/MW): 105dB / mW (1kHz) (when connecting via the headphone cable with the unit turned on) , 101dB / mW (1kHz) (when connecting via the headphone cable with the unit turned off)
specification.CORD LENGTH: Headphone cable (approx. 1.2m, OFC strands, gold-plated stereo mini plug)
